customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason, it leaves hair not feeling fully clean. Hair looks dirty and oily, especially at the crown and roots.
customer_reviews.author: Em K

customer_reviews.title: I Love It
customer_reviews.text: This is the first shampoo I have found that did not make my head itch. I am allergic to sulfates. I tried so many other ones first. I cannot use the companion conditioner.
